<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> NewFeatures = Features-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant/#a90b7d2d0eb9eb04c4d9e60c0fabb1efb">getUniqueInteger</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  NewFeatures.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a33f9f862dca8ee0f23bff5941bf433d8">setBit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a730efbdf567efc36a1d05cac8a9d3728">kSanitizerBinaryMetadataUARHasSizeBit</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.setMetadata(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">      LLVMContext::MD&#95;pcsections,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">      MDB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdbuilder/#a6022d366369fcd539dadfaefc80927db">createPCSections</a>(&#123;&#123;Section.getString(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">                             &#123;IRB.getInt(NewFeatures), IRB.getInt32(Size)&#125;&#125;&#125;));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
